MemoryInfobox.name: Thieves Bandits Bastards
MemoryInfobox.description: 'With the resources of the region stolen, all Thief|thieves became bold. A woman whose house was robbed plotted revenge against them.'

General_Description: '''Thieves Bandits Bastards''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A woman sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''[[Drachma]]e to anyone who can help me put these cursed [[Thief|thieves]] in their place!'' She sought out the woman and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a note on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Woman:''' ''All thieves are bold since our [[Nation Leader|leader]] died. Bastards dare to come into my home?!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You were robbed?'' *'''Woman:''' ''Thieves! [[Bandit]]s! Bastards. They violate my household and make off with the vase given to me for my wedding... Death is too kind for them!'' |-|You want it brought back to you.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to take it from the bandits.'' *'''Woman:''' ''You read me like an [[Pythia|oracle]].'' |-|You want them all killed.= (Accept - I'll bring it to you.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. I'll do it.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Thank the gods!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back when everything's taken care of.'' Kassandra did as asked, and then returned to the woman. *'''Woman:''' ''Tell me it's been handled, ''misthios. *'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.'' *'''Woman:''' ''You do good work, ''misthios''. Take this for your trouble.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you.''
